text: The women's 50 metres freestyle at the 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships was held at the National Aquatic Centre in Dublin from 13 - 19 August. 9 classification finals are held in all over this event. ==Medalists== {| |- |S5 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S5Dublin 2018 Official Results book. from Paralympic.org | || 38.55 | || 39.49 | || 39.77 |- |S6 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S6 | || 32.78 WR | || 32.79 | || 34.31 |- |S7 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S7 | || 32.83 ER | || 35.20 | || 35.23 |- |S8 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S8 | || 31.22 | || 31.34 | || 35.47 |- |S9 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S9 | || 29.01 | || 29.78 | || 30.39 |- |S10 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S10 | || 28.05 | || 28.30 | || 28.48 |- |S11 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S11 | || 30.22 WR | || 30.54 | || 31.17 |- |S12 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S12 | || 27.94 | colspan=2 bgcolor=#e8e8e8 align=center| no medal award | || 28.67 |- |S13 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S13 | || 26.90 | || 27.83 | || 28.63 |- |colspan=7| |- |- bgcolor= e8e8e8 |colspan=7| |} ==Results== ===S5=== ;Final {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" !
